mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID AS userId, u.USERNAME AS username, u.EMAIL AS email, r.ROLE_NAME AS role, u.IS_ACTIVE AS active, u.IS_EMAIL_VERIFIED AS emailActive, u.CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM USERS u JOIN USER_AUTHORITY ua ON u.USER_ID = ua.USER_ID JOIN ROLE r ON ua.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( EMAIL, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTH, IS_ACTIVE, IS_EMAIL_VERIFIED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 1, sysdate, sysdate )
